package.name: Instamojo_Imojo
package.summary: Collect Payments Instantly with a Link
package.description:
Instamojo lets you collect payments instantly. Start simply by creating a link by adding details. Share with your audience, through a link. And start collecting payments in minutes!

This extension allows you to use Instamojo as Payment Gateway.

Steps:


  • Create a payment link of type Services/membership on our website http://www.instamojo.com
  • Set its base price as 10 and check "Use 'Pay What You Want'" option.
  • If your website is say http://www.example.com then use http://www.example.com/index.php/imojo/payment/response/ as Custom Redirection URL. This is required to mark the payment as completed after redirection.
  • Now save the Payment link and go to More Options -> Custom Fields.
  • Create a custom field, let's say you named it "Orderd ID" and save it. The name is not important, the actual field name of this Custom Field will show up when you hover over that field, it has the format of Field_xxxxx, where "xxxxx" are numbers. This is what we are going to enter in the plugin's settings in Magento backend.


Magento plugin settings:

  • Enabled: Yes
  • Payment Action: Authorize and Capture
  • New Order status: Processing
  • API Key: Get this from http://www.instamojo.com/developers
  • Auth Token: Get this from http://www.instamojo.com/developers
  • Private Salt: Get this from http://www.instamojo.com/developers
  • Payment URL: Payment link's URL
  • Custom Field: Field_xxxx format field name we got from hovering over the Custom field.


For detailed steps with screenshots visit our GitHub page: https://github.com/Instamojo/Instamojo-Magento
